boat.full_description: Tasma was owned by my Grandfather between 1937 and 1957.  I have uploaded images I have found.  The photo shows my Grandparents, possibly my father and uncle plus maybe Zeb Milgate sailing off Mersea a little while after WW2.
boat.name: Tasma

ownerships.note: 'Tasma' was in the ownership of the Metcalfe family from 1962.
ownerships.text: 'Tasma' was in the ownership of the Metcalfe family from

boat.short_description: Reputedly built for the Governer of Tasmania, 'Tasma' sailed in the Solent moving to West Mersea in the 1930s.
